review.title: “Up and coming frozen dessert Franchise”
review.pros: Pros – Very experienced leaders in franchise industry. Product is second to none. Terrific support.
review.cons: Cons – Brand recognition(should change as they grow).
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Good group to work with.”
review.pros: Pros – I worked at the home office in Franklin, TN. At the time I was there, management was adding staff at the home office. The people in my department were mostly fun and easy going. Decent pay and decent benefits.
review.cons: Cons – Not a lot of creativity. Locked in a cycle of constant recycling of information and materials. Tends to wear one out after a while.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Constant meetings about the same thing over and over don't help to accomplish goals.
